meanings.definition: A condiment made of fruits or vegetables with vinegar, sugar, and spices.
meanings.sent1: I love to add chutneys to my sandwiches for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a variety of chutneys with the appetizers.
meanings.sent3: The chutneys at the picnic were so tasty, they disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her chutneys were like a burst of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The sweet and tangy chutneys danced on my taste buds.

meanings.sent1: She chutneys the meal with care to ensure the perfect balance of flavors.
meanings.sent2: In India, it is common to chutneys meals as a side dish.
meanings.sent3: He chutneys the dishes at the party, making them stand out.
meanings.sent4: The chef chutneys the chutneys with precision, creating culinary masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: Chutneying the dish elevated its taste to a whole new level.
